```{r setup, include=FALSE}

## This report requires summary files form mothur

require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
require(SummarizedExperiment)
require(webshot)
require(htmlwidgets)
debug <- FALSE
setEnvironments("phantomjs")
```

```{r prepare data, include=FALSE}
### rawDataSummary 
rawSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(rawPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTable
lengthDeduppedSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(lengthDeduppedPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTable
titleLengthDeduppedSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(lengthDeduppedPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle
mappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(mappedAndHomopFilteredPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTable
titleMappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(mappedAndHomopFilteredPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle
preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTable
titlePreClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTablePacbio <- createSummaryTable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredPacbio)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle

rawSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(rawIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTable
lengthDeduppedSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(lengthDeduppedIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTable
titleLengthDeduppedSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(lengthDeduppedIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle
mappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(mappedAndHomopFilteredIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTable
titleMappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(mappedAndHomopFilteredIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle
preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTable
titlePreClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTableIllumina <- createSummaryTable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredIllumina)$rawDataSummaryTableTitle



```

Started on `r format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")`

## Data pre-processing {.tabset}

### Summary of the raw reads
#### PacBio
```{r sumPB, echo=FALSE}
kable(rawSummaryTablePacbio,row.names=TRUE,  
      col.names=colnames(rawSummaryTablePacbio),format="html") %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F,
                position = "left")
```

#### Illumina
```{r sumIll, echo=FALSE}
kable(rawSummaryTableIllumina, row.names=TRUE, 
      col.names=colnames(rawSummaryTableIllumina), format="html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F,
                position = "left")
```

#### PacBio
